summary: Two successful career women (Patricia Royce, Lorraine Devon) in their 30s have problems with men, and a mutual ex-lover (J.D. Souther) in common.
cast: Patricia Royce|Lorraine Devon Wilke|JD Souther|Wade Madsen|Billy Burke|Bruce P. Young|David Crosby|Mark Jenkins|Susan Drummond|Jeffrey Dean Morgan|Art Kahn|Piper Henry|Mike Williams|Randy Dixon|Mark Dempsey|Evelyn Perdue|Anthony Curry|Robert McGinley|Tanya Pierce|Sally Smith|Kelle Kleingartner|Cole Ackman|James Huber|Eric Stachowski|Marjorie De Muynck|Amy Denio|Babs Helle|Stacy Loebs|Nanette Cresto|Thomas Arthur|Aimee Hargrave|Diana Cardiff|Alison Cockrill|Billy D. Marchese
title: To Cross the Rubicon
